summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%) and rainfall (up 1.9 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11786 lux) and cloud levels (up 230 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 16035 lux), the amount of wind (up 20 miles), cloud levels (up 553 m), and rainfall (down 1.5 mm) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 230.5m lower than yesterday, 488.4m lower than past week, 553.5m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 269m and a peak of 930m, averaging 312.9m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, humidity should not be a concern and mostly calm with light air movement. Rain showers likely, low clouds are expected, possibly some fog or persistent clouds, and the light is absent. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
